Key Match Events: The Memphis Grizzlies asserted their dominance from the very beginning, winning the first quarter 34-24 and following with a 35-19 victory in the second quarter.
Pre-Game Insights: Coach Taylor Jenkins revealed that Zach Edey said, 'Hey, just keep going. I'll get better one day at a time.' after the first game.
Post-Match Reflections: Santi Aldama led the way off the bench with 22 points, Jay Huff added 18 points while Ja Morant contributed 16 units.
Miscellaneous Highlights: The Orlando Magic were undefeated before the game but lost to the Memphis Grizzlies.
Zach Edey finished the night with 13 minutes, seven points and one rebound, but his four personal fouls played a key role in his reduced activity.
Others: Zach Edey's stats: Player PTS REB AST STL BLK TO Zach Edey 7 1 0 0 0 0
The season is just starting and Edey is still young. If he finds consistency, he can be a solid contributor for the Grizzlies.
